author: Jessy Khattak
comment: Definitely one of the best looking and most unique watch faces around but going from ambient to active takes a few seconds then a few more seconds before "Ok Google" or touch interactions work. I am using an up to date Huawei Watch. Massive let down for a great looking watch face.
title: Looks great but lag makes it unusable

author: Nicholas Hong
comment: Making the face use the full space of the square screen would be nice, instead of cropping it into a circle.
title: Good, but not great for square

author: BeeSawd
comment: Great looking watch but lags like hell, once that's fixed (and the resolution's raised a bit) this will easily be my everyday watch and get 5 stars.

author: sam helman
comment: I think this is one of the best watch faces every, it looks so cool

reply.author: Red Bred Inc.
reply.content: Update to do exactly that is coming out this weekend. Was supposed to last week but it got delayed a little...

author: Yasir Yousuf
comment: Really cool design. It took some time getting used to but I really love that it's one of the more unique Android watch faces!
title: Great design!

author: Tyler F
comment: Love this design. Just wish the ambient mode was the same cool design! Like maybe if only the relevant hour and minute pieces were visible, or maybe outlines or something.

reply.author: Red Bred Inc.
reply.content: Ambient mode was changed in the last update, many other users requested the same thing so it was made more like the regular face.

title: Awesome!
